## Packages 
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

```

## Data Import 
```{r}
claims <- read_csv("claims.csv")
claims
```

## Data Cleaning 
```{r}
claims_clean <- claims %>%
 filter(DEPARTMENTID >= 6L & DEPARTMENTID <= 20L)
  
claims_clean2 <- claims_clean %>%
  mutate(Year = year(ymd_hms(CURRENTILLNESSDATE)))

```

## Data Visualization
```{r}
 ggplot(claims_clean) +
 aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
 geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
claims_summary <- claims_clean2 %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(PatientCount = n_distinct(PATIENTID))

ggplot(claims_summary, aes(x = Year, y = PatientCount)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Number of Patients per Month",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Number of Patients"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```
